verses.verse: Ye shall make<WH6213> you no<WH3808> idols<WH457> nor graven image,<WH6459> neither<WH3808> rear you up<WH6965> a standing image,<WH4676> neither<WH3808> shall ye set up<WH5414> any image<WH4906> of stone<WH68> in your land,<WH776> to bow down<WH7812> unto<WH5921> it: for<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
Ye shall keep<WH8104> <WH853> my sabbaths,<WH7676> and reverence<WH3372> my sanctuary:<WH4720> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
If <WH518> ye walk<WH1980> in my statutes,<WH2708> and keep<WH8104> my commandments,<WH4687> and do<WH6213> them;

Then I will give<WH5414> you rain<WH1653> in due season,<WH6256> and the land<WH776> shall yield<WH5414> her increase,<WH2981> and the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704> shall yield<WH5414> their fruit.<WH6529>

And your threshing<WH1786> shall reach<WH5381> <WH853> unto the vintage,<WH1210> and the vintage<WH1210> shall reach<WH5381> <WH853> unto the sowing time:<WH2233> and ye shall eat<WH398> your bread<WH3899> to the full,<WH7648> and dwell<WH3427> in your land<WH776> safely.<WH983>

And I will give<WH5414> peace<WH7965> in the land,<WH776> and ye shall lie down,<WH7901> and none<WH369> shall make you afraid:<WH2729> and I will rid<WH7673> evil<WH7451> beasts<WH2416> out of<WH4480> the land,<WH776> neither<WH3808> shall the sword<WH2719> go<WH5674> through your land.<WH776>
And ye shall chase<WH7291> <WH853> your enemies,<WH341> and they shall fall<WH5307> before<WH6440> you by the sword.<WH2719>

And five<WH2568> of<WH4480> you shall chase<WH7291> a hundred,<WH3967> and a hundred<WH3967> of<WH4480> you shall put ten thousand to flight:<WH7291> <WH7233> and your enemies<WH341> shall fall<WH5307> before<WH6440> you by the sword.<WH2719>
For I will have respect<WH6437> unto<WH413> you, and make you fruitful,<WH6509> <WH853> and multiply<WH7235> you, and establish<WH6965> <WH853> my covenant<WH1285> with<WH854> you.
And ye shall eat<WH398> old store,<WH3465> <WH3462> and bring forth<WH3318> the old<WH3465> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the new.<WH2319>
And I will set<WH5414> my tabernacle<WH4908> among<WH8432> you: and my soul<WH5315> shall not<WH3808> abhor<WH1602> you.
And I will walk<WH1980> among<WH8432> you, and will be<WH1961> your God,<WH430> and ye<WH859> shall be<WH1961> my people.<WH5971>

I <WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> which<WH834> brought you forth<WH3318> <WH853> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> that ye should not be<WH4480> <WH1961> their bondmen;<WH5650> and I have broken<WH7665> the bands<WH4133> of your yoke,<WH5923> and made you go<WH1980> <WH853> upright.<WH6968>
But if<WH518> ye will not<WH3808> hearken<WH8085> unto me, and will not<WH3808> do<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH428> commandments;<WH4687>

And if<WH518> ye shall despise<WH3988> my statutes,<WH2708> or if<WH518> your soul<WH5315> abhor<WH1602> <WH853> my judgments,<WH4941> so that ye will not<WH1115> do<WH6213> <WH853> all<WH3605> my commandments,<WH4687> but that ye break<WH6565> <WH853> my covenant: <WH1285>

I <WH589> also<WH637> will do<WH6213> this<WH2063> unto you; I will even appoint<WH6485> over<WH5921> you terror,<WH928> <WH853> consumption,<WH7829> and the burning ague,<WH6920> that shall consume<WH3615> the eyes,<WH5869> and cause sorrow<WH1727> of heart:<WH5315> and ye shall sow<WH2232> your seed<WH2233> in vain,<WH7385> for your enemies<WH341> shall eat<WH398> it.

And I will set<WH5414> my face<WH6440> against you, and ye shall be slain<WH5062> before<WH6440> your enemies:<WH341> they that hate<WH8130> you shall reign<WH7287> over you; and ye shall flee<WH5127> when none<WH369> pursueth<WH7291> you.
And if<WH518> ye will not<WH3808> yet for<WH5704> all this<WH428> hearken<WH8085> unto me, then I will punish<WH3256> you seven times<WH7651> more<WH3254> for<WH5921> your sins.<WH2403>
And I will break<WH7665> <WH853> the pride<WH1347> of your power;<WH5797> and I will make<WH5414> <WH853> your heaven<WH8064> as iron,<WH1270> and your earth<WH776> as brass: <WH5154>

And your strength<WH3581> shall be spent<WH8552> in vain:<WH7385> for your land<WH776> shall not<WH3808> yield<WH5414> <WH853> her increase,<WH2981> neither<WH3808> shall the trees<WH6086> of the land<WH776> yield<WH5414> their fruits.<WH6529>

And if<WH518> ye walk<WH1980> contrary<WH7147> unto<WH5973> me, and will<WH14> not<WH3808> hearken<WH8085> unto me; I will bring seven times more<WH3254> <WH7651> plagues<WH4347> upon<WH5921> you according to your sins.<WH2403>

I will also send<WH7971> <WH853> wild<WH7704> beasts<WH2416> among you, which shall rob you of your children,<WH7921> <WH853> and destroy<WH3772> <WH853> your cattle,<WH929> and make you few in number;<WH4591> <WH853> and your high ways<WH1870> shall be desolate.<WH8074>
And if<WH518> ye will not<WH3808> be reformed<WH3256> by me by these things,<WH428> but will walk<WH1980> contrary<WH7147> unto<WH5973> me;
Then will I<WH589> also<WH637> walk<WH1980> contrary<WH7147> unto<WH5973> you, and will punish<WH5221> you yet<WH1571> seven times<WH7651> for<WH5921> your sins.<WH2403>

And I will bring<WH935> a sword<WH2719> upon<WH5921> you, that shall avenge<WH5358> the quarrel<WH5359> of my covenant:<WH1285> and when ye are gathered together<WH622> within<WH413> your cities,<WH5892> I will send<WH7971> the pestilence<WH1698> among<WH8432> you; and ye shall be delivered<WH5414> into the hand<WH3027> of the enemy.<WH341>

And when I have broken<WH7665> the staff<WH4294> of your bread,<WH3899> ten<WH6235> women<WH802> shall bake<WH644> your bread<WH3899> in one<WH259> oven,<WH8574> and they shall deliver you your bread again<WH7725> <WH3899> by weight:<WH4948> and ye shall eat,<WH398> and not<WH3808> be satisfied.<WH7646>
And if<WH518> ye will not<WH3808> for all this<WH2063> hearken<WH8085> unto me, but walk<WH1980> contrary<WH7147> unto<WH5973> me;
Then I will walk<WH1980> contrary<WH7147> unto<WH5973> you also in fury;<WH2534> and I, even<WH637> I,<WH589> will chastise<WH3256> you seven times<WH7651> for<WH5921> your sins.<WH2403>
And ye shall eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of your sons,<WH1121> and the flesh<WH1320> of your daughters<WH1323> shall ye eat.<WH398>

And I will destroy<WH8045> <WH853> your high places,<WH1116> and cut down<WH3772> <WH853> your images,<WH2553> and cast<WH5414> <WH853> your carcasses<WH6297> upon<WH5921> the carcasses<WH6297> of your idols,<WH1544> and my soul<WH5315> shall abhor<WH1602> you.

And I will make<WH5414> <WH853> your cities<WH5892> waste,<WH2723> and bring your sanctuaries unto desolation,<WH8074> <WH853> <WH4720> and I will not<WH3808> smell<WH7306> the savor<WH7381> of your sweet odors.<WH5207>
And I<WH589> will bring the land into desolation:<WH8074> <WH853> <WH776> and your enemies<WH341> which dwell<WH3427> therein shall be astonished<WH8074> at<WH5921> it.

And I will scatter<WH2219> you among the heathen,<WH1471> and will draw out<WH7324> a sword<WH2719> after<WH310> you: and your land<WH776> shall be<WH1961> desolate,<WH8077> and your cities<WH5892> waste.<WH2723>

Then <WH227> shall the land<WH776> enjoy<WH7521> <WH853> her sabbaths,<WH7676> as long as<WH3605> <WH3117> it lieth desolate,<WH8074> and ye<WH859> be in your enemies'<WH341> land;<WH776> even then<WH227> shall the land<WH776> rest,<WH7673> and enjoy<WH7521> <WH853> her sabbaths.<WH7676>
As long as<WH3605> <WH3117> it lieth desolate<WH8074> it shall rest;<WH7673> <WH853> because<WH834> it did not<WH3808> rest<WH7673> in your sabbaths,<WH7676> when ye dwelt<WH3427> upon<WH5921> it.

And upon them that are left<WH7604> alive of you I will send<WH935> a faintness<WH4816> into their hearts<WH3824> in the lands<WH776> of their enemies;<WH341> and the sound<WH6963> of a shaken<WH5086> leaf<WH5929> shall chase<WH7291> them; and they shall flee,<WH5127> as fleeing<WH4499> from a sword;<WH2719> and they shall fall<WH5307> when none<WH369> pursueth.<WH7291>

And they shall fall<WH3782> one<WH376> upon another,<WH251> as it were before<WH4480> <WH6440> a sword,<WH2719> when none<WH369> pursueth:<WH7291> and ye shall have<WH1961> no<WH3808> power to stand<WH8617> before<WH6440> your enemies.<WH341>
And ye shall perish<WH6> among the heathen,<WH1471> and the land<WH776> of your enemies<WH341> shall eat you up.<WH398> <WH853>

And they that are left<WH7604> of you shall pine away<WH4743> in their iniquity<WH5771> in your enemies'<WH341> lands;<WH776> and also<WH637> in the iniquities<WH5771> of their fathers<WH1> shall they pine away<WH4743> with<WH854> them.

If they shall confess<WH3034> <WH853> their iniquity,<WH5771> and the iniquity<WH5771> of their fathers,<WH1> with their trespass<WH4604> which<WH834> they trespassed<WH4603> against me, and that<WH834> also<WH637> they have walked<WH1980> contrary<WH7147> unto<WH5973> me;

And that I<WH589> also<WH637> have walked<WH1980> contrary<WH7147> unto<WH5973> them, and have brought<WH935> them into the land<WH776> of their enemies;<WH341> if<WH176> then<WH227> their uncircumcised<WH6189> hearts<WH3824> be humbled,<WH3665> and they then<WH227> accept<WH7521> of<WH853> the punishment of their iniquity: <WH5771>

Then will I remember<WH2142> <WH853> my covenant<WH1285> with Jacob,<WH3290> and also<WH637> <WH853> my covenant<WH1285> with Isaac,<WH3327> and also<WH637> <WH853> my covenant<WH1285> with Abraham<WH85> will I remember;<WH2142> and I will remember<WH2142> the land.<WH776>

The land<WH776> also shall be left<WH5800> of<WH4480> them, and shall enjoy<WH7521> <WH853> her sabbaths,<WH7676> while she lieth desolate<WH8074> without<WH4480> them: and they<WH1992> shall accept<WH7521> <WH853> of the punishment of their iniquity:<WH5771> because,<WH3282> even because<WH3282> they despised<WH3988> my judgments,<WH4941> and because their soul<WH5315> abhorred<WH1602> my statutes.<WH2708>

And yet<WH637> for all that,<WH1571> <WH2063> when they be<WH1961> in the land<WH776> of their enemies,<WH341> I will not<WH3808> cast them away,<WH3988> neither<WH3808> will I abhor<WH1602> them, to destroy them utterly,<WH3615> and to break<WH6565> my covenant<WH1285> with<WH854> them: for<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD<WH3068> their God.<WH430>

But I will for their sakes remember<WH2142> the covenant<WH1285> of their ancestors,<WH7223> whom<WH834> <WH853> I brought forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> in the sight<WH5869> of the heathen,<WH1471> that I might be<WH1961> their God:<WH430> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

These <WH428> are the statutes<WH2706> and judgments<WH4941> and laws,<WH8451> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> made<WH5414> between<WH996> him and the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> in mount<WH2022> Sinai<WH5514> by the hand<WH3027> of Moses.<WH4872>
